label.description: Text to the left of the search box

name.description: Name, which serves as an identifier when submitting the form
name.description_zh: 名称，作为提交表单时的标识符

shape.description: The shape of the search box, optionally round
shape.description_zh: 搜索框形状，可选值为 round

id.description: The search box id, and the for attribute of the label is set
id.description_zh: 搜索框 id，同时会设置 label 的 for 属性

background.description: The outer background color of the search box

maxlength.description: The maximum number of characters entered

clearable.description: Whether to enable the clear icon, clicking the clear icon will clear the input box
clearable.description_zh: 是否启用清除图标，点击清除图标后会清空输入框

clear-icon.description: Clear the icon name or image link, which is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
clear-icon.description_zh: 清除图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

clear-trigger.description: When the clear icon is displayed, 'always' means that the input box is not displayed when it is empty, and 'focus' means that the input box is focused and not displayed when it is empty
clear-trigger.description_zh: 显示清除图标的时机，`always` 表示输入框不为空时展示， `focus` 表示输入框聚焦且不为空时展示

autofocus.description: Whether or not autofocus is not supported by the iOS system
autofocus.description_zh: 是否自动聚焦，iOS 系统不支持该属性

show-action.description: Whether to display a cancel button to the right of the search box
show-action.description_zh: 是否在搜索框右侧显示取消按钮

disabled.description: Whether to disable the input field

readonly.description: Whether to set the input field to read-only status, and the content cannot be entered in the read-only state
readonly.description_zh: 是否将输入框设为只读状态，只读状态下无法输入内容

error.description: Whether or not to mark the input in red

error-message.description: The error message at the bottom is not displayed when it is empty
error-message.description_zh: 底部错误提示文案，为空时不展示

format-trigger.description: When the formatting function fires, the optional value is onBlur
format-trigger.description_zh: 格式化函数触发的时机，可选值为 onBlur

input-align.description: Input box content alignment, optionally 'center' right
input-align.description_zh: 输入框内容对齐方式，可选值为 `center` right

left-icon.description: The icon name or image link on the left side of the input box is equivalent to the [name property] of the Icon component(https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props)
left-icon.description_zh: 输入框左侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

right-icon.description: The icon name or image link on the right side of the input box is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
right-icon.description_zh: 输入框右侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

autocomplete.description_zh: input 标签原生的[自动完成属性](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete)

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Triggered when the content of the input box changes
events.description_zh: 输入框内容变化时触发

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggers when the input box gains focus
events.description_zh: 输入框获得焦点时触发

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus
events.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发

events.name: click-input
events.description: Triggered when you click on the input area

events.name: click-left-icon
events.description: Triggered when you click on the icon on the left

events.name: click-right-icon `3.4.0`
events.description: Triggered when you click on the icon on the right

events.name: clear
events.description: Triggered when the Clear button is clicked

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked

slots.name: left
slots.description: Customize the content on the left (outside the search box)
slots.description_zh: 自定义左侧内容（搜索框外）

slots.name: action
slots.description: Customize the content on the right (outside the search box) and display it after setting the show-action attribute
slots.description_zh: 自定义右侧内容（搜索框外），设置 show-action 属性后展示

slots.name: label
slots.description: Customize the text on the left (in the search box)
slots.description_zh: 自定义左侧文本（搜索框内）

slots.name: left-icon
slots.description: Customize the icon on the left (in the search box)
slots.description_zh: 自定义左侧图标（搜索框内）

slots.name: right-icon
slots.description: Customize the icon on the right (in the search box)
slots.description_zh: 自定义右侧图标（搜索框内）
